verses.verse: Have mercy<WH2603> on me,<WH430> God, according to your loving kindness.<WH2617> According to the multitude<WH7230> of your tender mercies,<WH7356> blot out<WH4229> my transgressions.<WH6588>
Wash<WH3526> me thoroughly<WH7235> from my iniquity.<WH5771> Cleanse<WH2891> me from my sin.<WH2403>
For I know<WH3045> my transgressions.<WH6588> My sin<WH2403> is constantly before me.<WH8548>

Against you,<WH2398> and you only, have I sinned, and done<WH6213> that which is evil<WH7451> in your sight;<WH5869> that you may be proved right<WH2135> when you speak,<WH1696> and justified<WH2135> when you judge.<WH8199>
Behold,<WH2342> I was brought forth in iniquity.<WH5771> In sin<WH2399> my mother<WH517> conceived me.<WH3179>
Behold,<WH2654> you desire truth<WH571> in the inward parts.<WH2910> You teach<WH3045> me wisdom<WH2451> in the inmost place.<WH5640>
Purify<WH2398> me with hyssop,<WH231> and I will be clean.<WH2891> Wash<WH3526> me,<WH3835> and I will be whiter than snow.<WH7950>
Let me hear<WH8085> joy<WH8342> and gladness,<WH8342> That the bones<WH6106> which you have broken<WH1794> may rejoice.<WH1523>
Hide<WH5641> your face<WH6440> from my sins,<WH2399> and blot out<WH4229> all of my iniquities.<WH5771>
Create<WH1254> in me a clean<WH2889> heart,<WH3820> O God.<WH430> Renew<WH2318> a right<WH3559> spirit<WH7307> within me.<WH7130>
Don't<WH7993> throw me from your presence,<WH6440> and don't<WH3947> take your holy<WH6944> Spirit from me.<WH7307>
Restore<WH7725> to me the joy<WH8342> of your salvation.<WH3468> Uphold<WH5564> me with a willing<WH5081> spirit.<WH7307>
Then I will teach<WH3925> transgressors<WH6586> your ways.<WH1870> Sinners<WH2400> shall be converted to you.<WH7725>
Deliver<WH5337> me from bloodguiltiness,<WH1818> O God,<WH430> the God<WH430> of my salvation.<WH8668> My tongue<WH3956> shall sing aloud<WH7442> of your righteousness.<WH6666>
Lord,<WH136> open<WH6605> my lips.<WH8193> My mouth<WH6310> shall declare<WH5046> your praise.<WH8416>
For you don't<WH2654> delight in sacrifice,<WH2077> or else I would give<WH5414> it.<WH7521> You have no pleasure in burnt offering.<WH5930>
The sacrifices<WH2077> of God<WH430> are a broken<WH7665> spirit.<WH7307> A broken<WH7665> and contrite<WH1794> heart,<WH3820> O God,<WH430> you will not despise.<WH959>
Do well in your good<WH3190> pleasure<WH7522> to Zion.<WH6726> Build<WH1129> the walls<WH2346> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>

Then you will delight<WH2654> in the sacrifices<WH2077> of righteousness,<WH6664> in burnt offerings<WH5930> and in whole<WH3632> burnt offerings.<WH5930> Then they will offer<WH5927> bulls<WH6499> on your altar.<WH4196>
